sources.title: Paper Man (1971)
sources.description: A prank that starts with a group of college students creating a fictitious person so they can get a credit card develops into a plot that leaves three of them dead. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/paper-man-1971/

metadata.Plot: Four college students take advantage of a credit card mistakenly issued to someone who doesn't exist, then use their university's computer to erase the charges they run up. But the computer seems to have some ideas of its own ...
metadata.Writer: James D. Buchanan, Ronald Austin, Anthony Wilson
metadata.Actors: Dean Stockwell, Stefanie Powers, James Stacy
